channel.title: Theme Test
channel.description: Just another CMS Dev Sites site

item.title: Column Shortcode Unit Test Shortcode
item.dc:creator: enej
item.content:encoded:
This is a simple unit test for the column grid shortcode. <hr />
You should see two column each taking up half the space
[column ] half [/column]
[column ] half [/column]
<hr />
here you should see 3 columns each taking up third of the space
[column size=4] 1st column's content goes here [/column]
[column size=4] 2nd column's content goes here [/column]
[column size=4] 3rd column's content goes here [/column]
<hr />
here you should see 4 columns each taking up a quarter of the space
[column size=3] 1st column's content goes here [/column]
[column size=3] 2nd column's content goes here [/column]
[column size=3] 3rd column's content goes here [/column]
[column size=3] 4th column's content goes here [/column]
<hr />
here you should see 4 columns each taking up a quarter of the space
[column grid="4" span="1" ] Some content [/column]
[column grid="4" span="1" ] Some content [/column]
[column grid="4" span="1"] Some content [/column]
[column grid="4" span="1"] Some content [/column]
<hr />
here you should see 3 columns the first two have one third the last one is pushed 1 sixth of a column and is only 1 sixth wide.
 
[column grid="6" span="2"] This is some very cool example content to use as an example.[/column]
[column grid="6" span="2"] This is some very cool example content to use as an example.[/column]
[column grid="6" push="1" span="1"] This is some very cool example content to use as an example.[/column]
